dcterms:creator: Seid Muhie Yimam
Sanja EStajner
Martin Riedl
Chris Biemann
dcterms:description: A dataset for Complex Word Identification (CWI) in English, consisting of news, WikiNews, and Wikipedia articles. Each sentence was annotated by 20 people, a mix of native and non-native speakers, to identify words that might be difficult for non-native speakers or those with language disabilities.
dcterms:title: English CWI Dataset
